00039 /**
00040  * @file initiator.h
00041  * @date 2008/05/01 16:15
00042  * @author Sergio Montenegro, Lutz Dittrich
00043  *
00044  * Copyright 2008 DLR
00045  *
00046  * Different events handlers
00047  *
00048  * @brief Just an interface class to allow an application to initialize before
00049  * scheduling.
00050  */
00051 
00052 #ifndef __INITIATOR_H
00053 #define __INITIATOR_H
00054 
00055 
00056 
00057 #ifndef NO_RODOS_NAMESPACE
00058 namespace RODOS {
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 /**
00062  * @class Initiator 
00063  *
00064  * @brief Just an interface class to allow an application to initialize before
00065  * being scheduled.
00066  *
00067  * It provides an init method which shall be overwritten by the applications
00068  * init() method. The init() method will be invoked before the execution of any 
00069  * thread is started.
00070  */
00071 
00072 class Initiator : public ListElement {
00073         friend void initSystem();
00074 protected:
00075         /** default list of all events */
00076         static List initiatorList;
00077 
00078         /**
00079          * Called by the iniator only once for each object in the system
00080          * at start up.
00081          *
00082          * Called before scheduling von threads beginns.
00083          */
00084 
00085         virtual void init(void) { }
00086 
00087 public:
00088         Initiator() : ListElement(initiatorList) { }
00089         virtual ~Initiator()  { }
00090 
00091 };
00092 
00093 
00094 #ifndef NO_RODOS_NAMESPACE
00095 }
00096 #endif

00098 
00099 #endif
